item.description:
Here's a chance to gather for lunch with your NE ATC+ friends (or to meet us, if you're a newcomer). There's no Meetup fee for this one, but, of course, we're each responsible for paying our own lunch tab--and whatever we spend at the A.C. Moore art-supply store next door.

Please RSVP "yes" if you'll be there. Change it to "no" if you can't make it. This is purely a social occasion.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group of rowdy women artists

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ Meetup--Lunch at John Harvard's Restaurant
